C is correct. D:While a published data source can be used in Tableau, it relies on a live connection to the underlying data.

choices.B: Drag Location to Size on the Marks card.
choices.C: Change the mark type to Map.
choices.A: Change the mark type to Density.
choices.D: Drag Population to Size on the Marks card.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
To make the map appear as shown in the provided visualization, you should:

A. Change the mark type to Density.

This will create a density map that visualizes the concentration of data points within the geographic area.

Selected Answer: A
A. Change the mark type to Density.
Changing the mark type to map will not change data points. The correct answer should be A.
A. Change the mark Type to Density not Map because they are not requesting for Filled Map.

Selected Answer: A
The chart below is a density plot. Changing mark type to map wouldn't do anything. Therefore, the answer should be A
IT SHOULD BE CHANGE MARK TYPE TO DENSITY

Selected Answer: B
To get the number of different types of awards that have been won, you should use the following formula:

**B. COUNTD([Award])**

This formula counts the distinct values in the "Award" field, giving you the number of different types of awards.
